**materials ** * 1 ball 9560 wine/gold a * 1 ball 1360 aran/gold b * 5mm us 8 circular needle 16 in long * 5 5mm us 9 circular needle 16 in long * 5 5mm us 9 double-pointed needles * stitch markers * yarn needle * pompom maker also available on the red heart united kingdom 1 and red heart deutschland 2 websites 1 http //www redheart co uk/free-patterns/knit-santa-hat 2 http //www redheart de/free-patterns/weihnachtsmannm%c3%bctze
